籤詩版本二:
Kumabvazuva, kune Chanjuan yakanaka mumwedzi, uye makore anoifukidza kwechinguva uye inoramba yakavanzwa.
Dzimwe nguva inogona kunge yakaita denderedzwa, asi dzimwe nguva inogona kushaikwa.
詩意:
Mwedzi uri muhexagram iyi wakafukidzwa nemakore.
Zvese zvichiri mu coma.
解曰: Makore anoyangarara anofukidza mwedzi. Hapana chikonzero chekukahadzika. Kumirira gore kuti riungane. Ipapo uchanzwisisa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Bao Gong iri kutsvaga Empress Li
Panguva yaitonga Zhenzong weRwiyo Rwenziyo, Empress Li (Empress Li) akanga ari mushandikadzi muimba yevakadzi.Akafarirwa naSong Zhenzong ndokukwidziridzwa kuva Wanyi, uye akava nepamuviri.
Asi panguva iyoyo, Murongo Liu Def (akazotevera Empress Liu) aiva nepfungwa dzakaipa uye akapa chiokomuhomwe kumukuru mukuru ainzi Guo Huai kuti atsive mwanakomana waEmpress Li nekatsi yakapfava, akabvuta mwanakomana wake ndokuudza mambo kuti akanga ari mwanakomana wake wokubereka. Song Zhenzong akatsamwa uye akatumira Li Empress kumuzinda unotonhora.
Mushure mokunge Murongo De asimudzirwa kuva mambokadzi, akaronga kuuraya Empress Li, uyo akapukunyuka kubva mumuzinda.
Rimwe zuva, Li Niangniang, aigara mumugwagwa, akasangana nenhumwa yamambo ainzi Bao Zheng, aitenderera munharaunda yacho. . Mushure mekunge Bao Zheng aziva nezve chiitiko ichi, akatora Li Niangniang ndokudzokera kuBeijing, akanoudza Song Renzong uye akaziva nezvenyaya iyi, uye pakupedzisira amai nemwanakomana vakazivana. Empress Dowager Liu nemukuru mukuru Guo Huai vakakotamisa misoro yavo vakareurura.
聖意: Handina kugadzikana pamba, ndinonamatira kuchengetedzwa kwemari, rombo rakanaka mubhizinesi, kusawirirana kwewanano, vanhu vari kumunda, makonye, ​​mhuka dzisina kunaka, dambudziko rekutsvaga vanhu, mhosva, kurasikirwa, kutama, kuchengetedza, kurasikirwa nepfuma, zvirwere zvekuMadokero, zvakaoma pora, gadziridza guva regomo
